metadata.title: CVE-2014-3621 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The catalog url replacement in OpenStack Identity (Keystone) before2013.2.3 and 2014.1 before 2014.1.2.1 allows remote authenticated users toread sensitive configuration options via a crafted endpoint, asdemonstrated by "$(admin_token)" in the publicurl endpoint field.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3621` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

keystone - 1:2014.1.3-0ubuntu1
python-keystone - 1:2014.1.3-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: keystone package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2014.1.3-0ubuntu1').
